text:
Ettaiyapuram police have arrested a farmer for allegedly murdering his younger brother.

The police said farmer Soundararajan (45) of Vangarapatti near Ettaiyapuram had property dispute with his elder brother Sakthivel (48). When Soundararajan was working in his farm on Friday morning, Sakthivel picked a heated argument with his younger brother. When the argument became a scuffle, Sakthivel attacked Soundararajan with a club in which the latter died on the spot.

After dumping the body in a nearby well, Sakthivel surrendered before Ettaiyapuram police.
title: Farmer kills brother
